survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Food Delivery Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of food delivery apps to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and preferences for future improvements.

questions.question_text: Which food delivery app do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for this single-choice question. Ensure 'Other' includes a text input field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which food delivery app do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using your preferred food delivery app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using your preferred food delivery app?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a food delivery app? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for this multi-choice question. Include an optional text input for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a limit of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a food delivery app? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your food delivery orders?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your food delivery orders?

questions.question_text: What types of issues have you encountered with your food delivery orders? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for this multi-choice question. Include an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of issues have you encountered with your food delivery orders? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent selects 'Rarely', 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' in Q4.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customer service provided by your preferred food delivery app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customer service provided by your preferred food delivery app?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred food delivery app to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred food delivery app to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your preferred food delivery app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text input for this question.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your preferred food delivery app?

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use food delivery apps in a typical month?
answer_options: I do not use food delivery apps regularly
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use food delivery apps in a typical month?
answer_options: I do not use food delivery apps regularly

questions.question_text: Do you prefer to pay for delivery fees or subscribe to a monthly membership for free deliveries?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for this single-choice question.
